description: Metrics for Waku nodes written in Nim

panels.title: Relay traffic per shard (in) - average of all peers
Relay traffic per shard (out) - average of all peers

panels.description: total number of proofs generated since the node started
panels.title: Total Generated RLN Proofs

panels.description: number of proofs remaining to be generated for the current epoch
panels.title: Remaining RLN Proofs per epoch
RLN Proof Generation TIme Changes per epoch ( Entropy )

panels.description: Shows the time spent while waiting for feedback from the database. That time includes the database query time plus the time spent waiting for the response from the database.
panels.title: Wait Queries To Finish (sec)

panels.description:
query-db-time: time for DB to complete query
send-store-resp-time: time for nwaku to process DB response and forward to the wire
panels.title: Store V3 Times details

panels.description: Total time from moment query hits nwaku node to response sent over wire. This represents an aggregation and helps to get an idea of current node's response time.
panels.title: Store V2 Times wire-to-wire

panels.description: Total time from moment query hits nwaku node to response sent over wire. This represents an aggregation and helps to get an idea of current node's response time.
panels.title: Store V3 Times wire-to-wire

panels.description: the number of bytes sent and received by the protocols.
panels.title: Bytes Exchanged

panels.description: the number of messages sent and received by the transfer protocol.
panels.title: Messages Exchanged

panels.description: the number of roundtrips for each reconciliation
panels.title: Distribution of Round-Trips per Reconciliation
Peer Exchange number of sent peers

panels.description: swap account state for each peer
panels.title: Waku Swap Account State

title: Nim-Waku V2
